You make a well placed shot or unleash a hail of fire to cover your allies. Make a ranged Strike against a target and select one ally within range of the same attack. If your Strike hits your target, you deal no damage, but the targeted creature becomes @UUID[Compendium.sf2e-anachronism.conditions.Item.enA7BxAjBb7ns1iF]{Suppressed} and takes a â€“2 circumstance penalty on attacks made against your ally until the end of your next turn.

@UUID[Compendium.sf2e-anachronism.feat-effects.Item.0kdfFVZuHoHTG5c0]{Effect: Covering Fire}

You can use Covering Fire as a 2-action activity to @UUID[Compendium.sf2e-anachronism.actions.Item.oc0ZKnk5zD0GXqZi]{Area Fire} or @UUID[Compendium.sf2e-anachronism.actions.Item.6ctkxUnVwqooSvgg]{Auto-Fire} instead of making a ranged Strike, affecting targets that fail their save.
